releases.summary: Major release with Neovim plugin integration
highlights: Neovim plugin (nvim-ccasp) with multi-agent grid, control panel, Telescope integration
Multi-agent grid: Run 6 Claude CLI sessions in aligned grid layout
Control panel: Floating panel for feature toggles, model selection
Hook manager: Visual management of Pre/Post tool use hooks
Dashboard: Project overview with token usage, installed components
Telescope integration: Browse commands, skills, hooks with fuzzy finding
Statusline components: Token usage, agent status for lualine

other.name: nvim-ccasp
other.description: Comprehensive Neovim plugin for CCASP integration with multi-agent grid, control panel, Telescope, and statusline

releases.summary: Fix: resolve 401 auth error in happy-start command
highlights: Fixed: resolve 401 auth error by unsetting HAPPY_SERVER_URL before launch
Improved: PowerShell Start-Process for clean environment inheritance on Windows

highlights: add comprehensive Happy.engineering mobile UI support

make co-author attribution configurable

releases.summary: Fix: update notification system and add update modes to /update-check
highlights: Fix update notification not showing - hook was writing to wrong state file location
Auto-repair outdated hooks during ccasp init (fixes Issue #9)
Fix stale version display in /menu - now always reads dynamically from ccasp-state.json
Add Smart Update mode (A) - protects customizations while adding new features
Add Full Overwrite mode (B) - replaces all .claude/ assets while preserving config
Improved update check instructions with step-by-step guidance

other.name: Smart Update Mode
other.description: Protect your customized commands/skills while adding new features

other.description: ccasp init now detects and fixes outdated hooks automatically

releases.summary: Feature: Phase 2 of 85 Recommendations - 7 Advanced Hook Templates
highlights: Added session-id-generator.template.js - UUID sessions with PID-keyed registry
Added git-commit-tracker.template.js - Track commits per phase in PROGRESS.json
Added branch-merge-checker.template.js - Validate main branch sync before deployments
Added issue-completion-detector.template.js - Natural language completion detection
Added token-usage-monitor.template.js - Cumulative token tracking with respawn warning
Added autonomous-decision-logger.template.js - JSONL audit trail for agent decisions
Added phase-validation-gates.template.js - 5-gate validation before phase auto-chaining
New 'advancedHooks' optional feature in init.js

hooks.name: session-id-generator
hooks.description: Generates UUID sessions with PID-keyed registry for parallel session isolation

hooks.name: git-commit-tracker
hooks.description: Tracks git commits per phase and updates PROGRESS.json for rollback support

hooks.name: branch-merge-checker
hooks.description: Validates main branch sync status before deployments

hooks.name: issue-completion-detector
hooks.description: Detects completion phrases and triggers deployment pipeline

hooks.name: token-usage-monitor
hooks.description: Tracks cumulative token usage with auto-respawn warning at 90%

hooks.name: autonomous-decision-logger
hooks.description: Creates JSONL audit trail for all agent decisions

releases.summary: Feature: Phase 1 of 85 Recommendations - 5 New Hook Templates
highlights: Added tool-output-cacher.template.js - Caches large outputs, saves ~500 tokens per output
Added token-budget-loader.template.js - Pre-calculates daily budget, ~5K tokens/session savings
Added happy-title-generator.template.js - Auto-generates session titles with issue numbers
Added happy-mode-detector.template.js - Detects Happy daemon environment
Added context-injector.template.js - Injects prior session context for continuity
All hooks now configurable via .claude/config/hooks-config.json
Updated tokenManagement feature to include token-budget-loader and tool-output-cacher
Updated happyMode feature to include all Happy-related hooks
